function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation leading to increased transmission of viruses","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion and spread of diseases among building occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and air filtration methods, conducting regular maintenance of HVAC systems","Technologies":"Efficient air ventilation systems, HEPA filters, UV air disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facilities management"},{"Description":"Inadequate distancing measures leading to higher risk of virus transmission","Impact":"Increased likelihood of close contact and virus spread among building occupants","Mitigation":"Establishing clear distancing guidelines, creating physical barriers, regulating visitor capacity","Technologies":"Contactless entry systems, occupancy monitoring technology, physical barriers (e.g., plexiglass partitions)","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facilities management"},{"Description":"Lack of hygiene facilities leading to poor sanitation and disease spread","Impact":"Higher risk of contamination and disease transmission due to inadequate hygiene practices","Mitigation":"Providing hand washing stations, ensuring cleanliness and availability of sanitization materials","Technologies":"Touchless hand sanitizers, automatic hand washing stations, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facilities management"}]}
